resources.string: This will delete all data of the last event from the device.
The scanned QR code is not valid.
Your app is not compatible with the version of pretix on the server. Please check for updates.

For the first step, you need to go to your pretix installation with your computer\'s browser. Please activate the pretixdroid plugin for your event and scan the QR code on the pretixdroid configuration page.
You now have to make a few choices on how you want to use this app.
This is the only device I want to use for this event
I want to use the app across multiple devices
It is important to me that every ticket only gets in once, even if the app does not work during a network failure.
It is important to me that the app continues to work during a network failure, even if someone gets in with the same ticket twice.
